summary: The client agreed to redo a task as 16, likely referring to story points. An API call to add a story to the backlog failed with a 404 error.

decisions.title: Redo task as 16
decisions.details: Client confirmed agreement to redo the item as 16

actions.task: Investigate and resolve the 404 error for the backlog add-story API endpoint

risks.risk: Failed API request to add story due to endpoint not found
risks.mitigation: Verify the server is running on localhost:8000 and the /api/backlog/add-story route exists
